The claim was made by Charmaine Yoest: president and CEO of Americans United for Life, during a committee hearing.
Yoest stated that in 2010 alone: 1,270 infants were reported to have died following attempted abortions.
However: both the CDC and the Alan Guttmacher Institute, which collects abortion data, stated that they do not collect data on infants who die after surviving abortion attempts.
